channel.title: Conv/unipolar2bipolar
channel.description: Just wondering if there is a clear way to know when the conv/unipolar2bipolar object is needed to trigger hardware pots, and what connections they are not. I understand they are used for osc, but are they needed for other objects like delays and effects? Seems to work when I use them but curious if I am using them incorrectly in the chain. Thanks!

item.title: Conv/unipolar2bipolar

item.description:
@dungeontroll666 wrote:

Thanks! Sometimes when I search for a topic I seem to hit the wrong keywords so just asking in case. I appreciate the help very much!

Read full topic

Just a tip to solve your queries more quickly, try searching the forum, you'll find that a lot of questions have already been asked and answered and you won't have to wait around for hours for a reply, for example this is the first result when you type unipolar into the search field.
